## RichText.onChanges() method

`onChanges` registers a handler of onChanges event.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onChanges(handler: (changes: Array<RichTextChange<A>>) => void): void;
```

|  handler | (changes: Array&lt;RichTextChange&lt;A&gt;&gt;) =&gt; void |  |
